DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study to investigate whether the administration of high-dose tirofiban before primary PCI could reduce myocardial infarct size, using analysis of contrast-enhanced magnetic resonance imaging.
DOC.brief_title: The Effects of Facilitated Percutaeous Coronary Intervention in Acute Myocardial Infarction
DOC.criteria: presence of chest pain for more than 30 minutes but less than 12 hours after symptom onset STsegment elevation more than 1 mm in two or more contiguous leads or presumably a newonset left bundle branch blockage hemodynamic instability history of MI old age > 80years Patients with bleeding diathesis (coagulopathy, thrombocytopenia or platelet dysfunction, Gastrointestinal or genitourinary bleeding within the prior 3 months)
